question: For the coagulation of positively charged hydrated ferric-oxide sol, the flocculating power of the ions is in the order:
explanation: According to Hardy-Schulze rule, for a positively charged sol, the coagulating power of anions increases with the magnitude of charge. Thus, the order is <katex>$[Fe(CN)_6]^{4-} > PO_4^{3-} > SO_4^{2-} > Cl^-$</katex>.
